title: As I SAW The beginning of rendezvous
description: As I saw is a horror novel by an Indian author Umar Hasan. The novel is a narration of the writer's ghost encounters. The story begins with writer's first experience in 1994 in Bihar (a state in India) when the writer was just a school going boy. As the writer grows his ghost encounters also grow in frequency. With every ghost encounter, the writer develops the strength to face ghosts. The biggest reveal happens when the writer meets a famous Tarot card reader
author: Umar Hasan
